message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you, and this is a fair price.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,800?
